\subsection{Function Documentation}
\hypertarget{namespacechaos_1_1math_a8cdea3a2be1387d86833df4e8ca1d8f9}{\index{chaos\-::math@{chaos\-::math}!float\-\_\-equals@{float\-\_\-equals}}
\index{float\-\_\-equals@{float\-\_\-equals}!chaos::math@{chaos\-::math}}
\subsubsection[{float\-\_\-equals}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}bool chaos\-::math\-::float\-\_\-equals (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{float}]{a, }
\item[{float}]{b, }
\item[{float}]{error\-\_\-threshold = {\ttfamily {\bf chaos\-::math\-::\-E\-P\-S\-I\-L\-O\-N}}}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{namespacechaos_1_1math_a8cdea3a2be1387d86833df4e8ca1d8f9}


Checks whether two floating point values are considered equal or not. 

This check is done by using the {\ttfamily error\-\_\-threshold} parameter. If the difference between the two values is less than {\ttfamily error\-\_\-threshold} then the values are considered to be equal.
